concept-wr.title: Host Management on an Active System
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can add or remove hosts and change disks without interrupting the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade.

conbody.p: To make changes to a host, you must lock it. Locking a host automatically and seamlessly redirects activity to other available hosts. While the host is locked, you can safely power it down and make disk changes, or remove the host and insert a new one.
After making the required configuration changes, you can unlock the host and begin using it.
